text: @FoxNews In 2009 the swine flu killed 12000 Americans. But Every day I went to work and my kids went to school. No closures, no layoffs, no lines, no shortages, no economic crash. The flu went away. This reaction to COVID-19 is an attempt to destroy Trump and the USA.
